Package src.UI

Class PatientAppointmentUI

java.lang.Object
src.UI.AppointmentUI
src.UI.PatientAppointmentUI
public class PatientAppointmentUI extends AppointmentUI
Provides a user interface for managing patient appointments, including viewing available slots, scheduling, rescheduling, canceling, and displaying appointments for a specific patient. Extends the AppointmentUI class.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    PatientAppointmentUI(Patient patient)
    Initializes the UI with a patient and patient controller.

      patientController - Controller for handling patient-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • viewSlots

      public void viewSlots()
      Displays available time slots for the selected doctor on a specified date.

    • scheduleAppointment

      public void scheduleAppointment(AppointmentController appointmentController)
      Schedules an appointment for the patient with a selected doctor on a chosen date and time slot.
      Parameters:
      appointmentController - The controller managing appointment creation.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      public void rescheduleAppointment(IDisplayableView<Appointment> appointmentView, IListDisplayableView<Appointment> appointmentListView, PatientController patientController)
      Reschedules an existing appointment for the patient, allowing the patient to choose a new date and time slot.
      Parameters:
      appointmentView - The view displaying the details of the appointment.
      appointmentListView - The view displaying a list of appointments.

    • displayAppointments

      public void displayAppointments(IListDisplayableView<Appointment> appointmentListView, PatientController patientController)
      Displays all appointments for the patient, grouped by appointment status.
      Parameters:
      appointmentListView - The view displaying a list of appointments.

    • cancelAppointment

      public void cancelAppointment(IListDisplayableView<Appointment> appointmentListView, PatientController patientController)
      Cancels an appointment by marking it with the status AppointmentStatus.CANCELLED.
      Parameters:
      appointmentListView - The view displaying a list of appointments.

    • displaySlots

      public void displaySlots(LocalDate selectedDate, LocalTime startTime, LocalTime endTime, ArrayList<Appointment> existingAppointments, ArrayList<LocalTime> availableSlots)
      Displays the available time slots for the selected date, ensuring no conflict with existing appointments.
      Parameters:
      selectedDate - The date selected for the appointment.
      startTime - The starting time of availability.
      endTime - The ending time of availability.
      existingAppointments - A list of existing appointments for the doctor.
      availableSlots - A list to store available time slots.

    • selectDoctor

      public Doctor selectDoctor()
      Prompts the user to select a doctor from the available list.
      Returns:
      The selected doctor, or null if no doctors are available.

    • selectDate

      public LocalDate selectDate()
      Prompts the user to enter a date for scheduling or rescheduling an appointment.
      Returns:
      The selected date.
